Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $21.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:14:53 UTC – Details)


Fans of the award-winning Stuff You Should Know podcast–and those who are just curious about the world–can experience the show’s content in an exciting way with the Trivial Pursuit: Stuff You Should Know game. Get ready to challenge friends as you take turns answering interesting, obscure, and amazing trivia questions. This fun party game features 600 questions from 6 different categories, inspired by different episodes of Stuff You Should Know. Stuck on a question? Use a lifeline such as “Stuff Someone Else Should Know,” 50/50, and more. The first player to fill their board with each of the 6 category tokens wins! Know someone who loves trivia games? The Trivial Pursuit board game makes one of the best gifts for teens, adults, and trivia fans. This is a fun party board game for adults and teens ages 16+. All Rights in and to the Podcast “Stuff You Should Know”, and all elements thereof, Under License by iHeartMedia + Entertainment, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Trivial Pursuit, the associated logo, the distinctive design of the gameboard, trivia cards, game tokens, and scoring wedges are trademarks of Hasbro.
ANSWER TRIVIA FROM THE HIT PODCAST: Prove you know your stuff by answering trivia questions inspired by episodes of the hugely popular podcast Stuff You Should Know
INCLUDES 600 TRIVIA QUESTIONS: Get ready for weird, fascinating, and unbelievable trivia. Each question is inspired by topics from different episodes of the Stuff You Should Know podcast.
FEATURES 6 FASCINATING CATEGORIES: History; Pop Culture; Myths, Legends, and Conspiracies; Science and Tech; Humans; and SYSK Selects, a mix of topics hand-picked by podcast hosts, Josh and Chuck
GAME FOR 3-6 PLAYERS: If you’re a fan of the Stuff You Should Know podcast or just curious about the world, this trivia game’s for you. Get ready for fun facts about food to flies, to hiccups and more
BOARD GAME FOR ADULTS AND TEENS: This Trivial Pursuit: Stuff You Should Know Edition Game is great for teens and adults ages 16 and up

Read more

Trivial Pursuit: Stuff You Should Know Edition

Fans of the award-winning Stuff You Should Know podcast–and those who are just curious about the world–can experience the show’s content in an exciting way with the Trivial Pursuit Game: Stuff You Should Know Edition.

Get ready to challenge friends as you take turns answering interesting, obscure, and amazing trivia questions. The game features 600 questions from 6 different categories, inspired by different episodes of Stuff You Should Know. Stuck on a question? Use a lifeline such as “Stuff Someone Else Should Know”, 50/50 and more. The first player to fill their board with each of the 6 category tokens wins the game.

Includes:

  • 300 Cards (600 Questions)
  • 6 Category Boards
  • 36 Category Tokens
  • 18 Lifeline Tokens
  • 6 Dividers
  • Instructions

Read more

Unique Stocking Stuffers For Men Universal Socket

We are a professional hardware manufacturer with over 30 years of experience who pursues to create a safe living space and bring safety and comfort for everyone in daily life.

The Universal Socket Set is suitable for everyone who needs it, whether you are a professional or an average person.

The Magical Grip Socket instantly adjusts to grip hex nuts, hooks, eye and lag screws, bolt heads, and other various shape and size objects. This universal socket can be used in the automotive industry, home maintenance, manufacturing, construction and other industries.

One Size Fits Most Super Universal Socket

The universal socket fits both standard 1/4 to 3/4 inch and metric 7 to 9 mm nuts and bolts.

It can also grasp any shape nut,such as wing nut,hook nut,flange nut,hex nuts, square nuts, crew eyes, tension screws, bolt heads, even worn and damaged heads!

Upgraded Much Stronger Socket Tool

We use 54 super strong steel rods that are individually spring actuated allowing the socket to automatically conform to any shape instantly.

Move to different types of fasteners without every changing sockets!

No need to hunt a socket. This covers most sizes and Works on stripped bolts and odd shapes ones too.

Satisfy Your Different Needs

The 3/8″ adapter included turns any power drill instantly into a power socket driver.

This universal socket is perfect for home improvement, construction, carpentry, auto repair, and other household maintenance.

Read more

Great Time Saver Tool Gifts

The universal socket allows for going from fastener to another seamlessly.

This is perfect for auto repair and no more stopping, searching, and switching for the correct socket.

Easy to Carry Dad Gifts

HELEMAN socket set delivers accurate appliance and extended bolts compatibility suitable for any kind of repair work.

Keep it in your car, boat, bike, backpack, tackle box, or back pocket!

Perfect Gifts for DIYer

Professional self adjusting universal repair tools.Can be used in household maintenance, and construction

Offer this handy universal socket tool to any DIY enthusiast friend and they will definitely appreciate it.

Product Description

Wonderful Gift & Decoration

LED atmosphere speakers blend well with room decors, it’s a great gift for birthday/housewarming

Torch Light Bluetooth Speakers

Bluetooth speakers with lights easily create you a sweet weekend and romantic evening experience.

Multi-Sync Connection

Sync up to 100 flame Bluetooth speakers together to get a more immersive sound experience.

IPX5 Waterproof

This speaker can stand up to splashes, spills, and light rain. Great for use by the pool or beach.

1 Wonderful Gift & Decors 2 LED Flame Light 3 Multi-Sync Connection 4 IPX5 Waterproof

360° Surround & HD Sound

Enjoy stunningly balanced sound with great clarity thanks to its cutting-edge DSP technology. Pair 2 speakers together to enjoy 360° room-filling sound. Pair more speakers together to get a more immersive sound experience for big events and parties.

Long Last Battery Life

Built-in new upgrade lithium-ion rechargeable battery, KUCCHERO outdoor speaker offers music up to 12 hours per charge and lasts over 24 hours as a table lamp, creating natural & realistic flames, which is perfect for outdoor / indoor decoration.

Premium Bluetooth Version 5.0

Boasting the latest, lightning-fast Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity protocol, the speaker pairs with Bluetooth-enabled devices like smart phones and additional KUCCHERO speakers within a range of 80 feet (no barriers), automatically reconnects to the last device used.

3 Lighting Modes

In flickering flame light mode, natural, realistic dancing flames form a lively campfire atmosphere. In candlelight mode, the breathing light creates a romantic atmosphere and helps users fall asleep faster. In full brightness mode, it adds 360° illumination to your space.

Technical Specifications

Audio Output 10W Distortion < 6% Sound Quality DSP Balanced Technology Connection Type Bluetooth 5.0, Aux Input Lights 3 Modes, 3 Levels of brightness Charing Port Type-C Charging Time 2.5 Hours Product Size 4″ Φ x 7″ H / unit Mounting Mode Hook for Hang, Wall-Mount, Stake

4-in-1 Upgraded Outdoor Bluetooth Speakers – This 360° LED atmosphere speaker combines 4 functions in 1: Portable Wireless Speaker, Atmosphere Lamp, LED Night Light, and Decoration Lantern. Cutting-edge DSP technology gives a well-balanced sound with great clarity. Its crystal clear sound and optional light effects easily set the right atmosphere for any occasion. Perfect for bringing premium music, illumination, and ambiance to your home, party, patio, fire pit, backyard, beach, camping trips
Support Multi-point Connections, Loud 360° Surround Sound – The latest technology allows you to sync up to 100 KUCCHERO flame Bluetooth speakers. Pair 2 speakers together to enjoy 360° room-filling sound. Pair more speakers together to get a more immersive sound experience for big events and outdoor parties
Bluetooth Speakers with Light Show – Press the light button to toggle between 3 different lighting modes or turn the light off. In flickering flame light mode, natural, realistic dancing flames form a lively campfire atmosphere. In candlelight mode, the breathing light creates a romantic atmosphere and helps users fall asleep faster. In full brightness mode, it adds 360° illumination to your space. Warm light makes LED flame speakers nice outdoor Christmas decorations and Christmas gifts
IPX5 Water Resistant – This portable outdoor speaker can stand up to splashes, spills, and light rain. Great for use by the pool or beach. Enjoy crisp, loud and clear music via Bluetooth 5.0 or the AUX jack. With the latest Type-C charging port, you can enjoy loud and clear sound and exciting light effects for hours on a single charge
Wonderful Decoration & Gift Ideas: Portable LED atmosphere Bluetooth speakers blend well with modern room decor and are easy to carry around, making them great camping gifts, housewarming gifts, birthday gifts for men and women, teenage girls and boys. 2 hooks, 2 stakes, and 2 wall mounts are included for easy placement
